originalText.text: Perfect location, walking distance to Times Square and 5th avenue. Only grip is no fridge or microwave in the room. Service was excellent and the rooms are clean and comfortable. Nice views also

text.text: Perfect location, walking distance to Times Square and 5th avenue. Only grip is no fridge or microwave in the room. Service was excellent and the rooms are clean and comfortable. Nice views also

originalText.text: The location, service, and accommodation of this hotel were amazing. My family and I enjoyed it very much. The only thing is that they do not have microwaves inside the rooms, but they have a very spacious fridge and we loved it.

text.text: The location, service, and accommodation of this hotel were amazing. My family and I enjoyed it very much. The only thing is that they do not have microwaves inside the rooms, but they have a very spacious fridge and we loved it.

originalText.text: Decent hotel in a great location. Everything you would expect from a Hilton and good sized rooms for NYC. Very good cleanliness standards and service.  Would have given 5 stars if it weren’t for the elevators. These systems must be from the 1970s. For most of our 1 week stay there was 1 serviceable elevator in a 44 floor building, which didn’t seem to stop on the way down. We frequently spent 10+ minutes waiting for a lift. Not good enough from Hilton

text.text: Decent hotel in a great location. Everything you would expect from a Hilton and good sized rooms for NYC. Very good cleanliness standards and service.  Would have given 5 stars if it weren’t for the elevators. These systems must be from the 1970s. Not good enough from Hilton

originalText.text: This was our first time staying at The Residences and we loved it!  The room was spacious, the bed comfortable and the concierges were all friendly, helpful and accommodating.  The location was amazing!  It's right next to Central Park. Thanks for making this trip possible for us, we loved it!

text.text: This was our first time staying at The Residences and we loved it!  The room was spacious, the bed comfortable and the concierges were all friendly, helpful and accommodating.  The location was amazing!  It's right next to Central Park. Thanks for making this trip possible for us, we loved it!

originalText.text:
I stayed in a 1br suite w/ sleeper sofa easter week 2023 and it was perfectly fine. My main goal was a very quiet room as i am an incredibly light sleeper. my room was on 44 and with earplugs i didn’t hear as much as a car horn! wonderful. the linens were a little bit rough as were the towels, and as others have noted the climate controls were challenging. what i found helped was running it on coolest setting on high fan all day while i was out. i had to do this because the a/c was also incredibly loud so i needed to shut it off at night. the shower was fine, coffee maker worked and they had bottled water each day. the main hotel amenities are limited and overly expensive but it’s manhattan so there are thousands of choices within blocks.
if the climate control situation were dealt with and there were nicer towels and sheets it would be a 5 star for me.
